«««< HEAD Competency is a critical issue in nearly every stage of a criminal case, especially for people with I/DD. This paper demystifies the complex topic of competency by examining it from a number of different angles. Written as an education resource and advocacy tool for criminal justice professionals and disabilty advocates, the paper reveals challenges with the current comptency framework and suggests best practices and potential solutions.
